CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS goods ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, name TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(64 > LENGTH(name)), price DECIMAL NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMPZ NOT NULL, expires_at TIMESTAMPZ NOT NULL, quantity BIGINT NOT NULL, status TEXT NOT NULL CHECK(64 > LENGTH(status)), updated_at TIMESTAMPZ, );
ALTER TABLE goods ADD COLUMN search tsvector GENERATED ALWAYS AS (to_tsvector('russian', replace(goods.name, 'ั', 'ะต'))) STORED; CREATE INDEX goods_search_index ON goods USING GIN (search);
